alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 10:23AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN WASHBURN AND EAST CENTRAL BURNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM CDT... At 1022 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Webster, or 20 miles west of Spooner, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half inch hail near Webster. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Webb Lake Wisconsin around 1035 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
